name: ThreatMiner
description: Displays enrichment data related to various indicator types from the ThreatMiner API.

options.name: ThreatMiner API URL
options.description: The base URL of the ThreatMiner API including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Ignore List
options.description: List of domains and IPs that you never want to send to ThreatMiner

options.name: Ignore Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignore IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.
